function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global spread of COVID-19","Impact":"High number of infections, hospitalizations, and deaths","Mitigation":"Implementation of public health measures such as wearing masks and social distancing","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, ventilation systems","People":"General public, healthcare workers, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Potential future pandemics","Impact":"High number of infections, hospitalizations, and deaths","Mitigation":"Research and preparedness for future outbreaks, development of vaccines and treatments","Technologies":"Genomic surveillance, vaccine development technologies","People":"Global population, healthcare workers, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Interaction between urban environment and pandemics","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission in built environments","Mitigation":"Implementation of design and planning strategies to enhance safety and adaptability of urban environments","Technologies":"Smart city technologies, urban design principles","People":"Urban residents, city planners, architects","Owner":"City planning authorities, architectural firms"}]}
